# defaultInstrument

**Type Property**

A constant that represents the default instrument identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
class let defaultInstrument: UInt32
```

## Discussion

The system uses the instrument loaded on the channel [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVExtendedNoteOnEvent/groupID].
title: defaultInstrument
